strings:
<voice_0x01001417><center>This is as far as I can take you.
<center>I dare not approach any closer
<center>lest Gemon see me.

<voice_0x01001418><center>But the mountain is riddled with caves.
<center>It should be possible for you humans
<center>to ascend to its summit on foot.

<voice_0x01001419><center>When you wish to return to the hill,
<center>call for me and I will take you back.

<voice_0x0100141A><center>Farewell for now.
<center>Please save my egg.
<center>You are my only hope.
